posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
HamarWetten wrote:I'm looking for..
5: I want to use a scythe and a tower shield, and have knockdown
This build will be limited to PRC servers or others that have customized scythe to be used as 1-hand weapons. So basically, just build a typical WM scyther and use a shield on those servers that provide that functionality. No biggie.

1. You have not described the preferred magic environment which can make a HUGE difference in recommending an effective solution. So is this for low-, medium- or high-magic? If for "All types of servers", there ain't no such animal and never will be. Available gear can also impact the overall effectiveness of any build.

2. DevCrit or No DevCrit? I assume No DevCrit since your request specifies "massive damage massive crits". The best WM build I've found to do the highest damage possible with the highest AB possible is Thax's WM DP-exploit scyther which could be modified for half-orc to focus primarily on the buffing aspects (WIS will need to be sacrificed). One of the benefits of a build like this is that the AB potential is so high (60+) that Great STR feats can be tossed aside without impacting the overall effectiveness to achieve greater flexibility (like adding Improved KD during epic, for instance).

If you prefer a pure non-buffing H&S version, it will be less effective, however. Overall high damage WM scythers are a dime a dozen and one of the easiest to design. For a DevCrit version, damage become secondary except against crit immunes and those creatures, like bosses, with ridiculous AC levels.

3. XP penalty an issue? Some folks care, others don't. It will become a factor using any primary class other than barb.

Help us help you.

Oh... and Welcome aboard the New ECB!

I was thinking "What if I drop Barbarian?" It makes the build easier to make. Here's one I made just now, this time remembering Knockdown. You could replace Blind Fight with Improved Knockdown, but then stealthy enemies will be a bigger problem.

If you use a scimitar instead, you would get more crits (more chances at Dev Crit), you could use a shield, and Weapon Proficiency Exotic would not be needed, freeing a feat for Improved Knockdown.
